#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<stdlib.h>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
//my  name in vipin
int main()
{ long int t,n,m;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>m;
		if(n==1||m==1)
		cout<<max(n,m)<<"\n";
		else
		cout<<(__gcd(n-1,m-1)+1)<<"\n";
	}
}
